name: Why Did The Chicken Cross The Road
name_original: Why Did The Chicken Cross The Road
description:
SEIZURE WARNING: Late game content has a somewhat visually intense bit.

If you keep asking questions eventually you might find answers.

This is an interactive essay on humor.  It will make more (or less) sense the longer you interact with it.

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
